description: Flaky cod baked with crispy breadcrumbs and lemon zest, served with garlic mashed potatoes and steamed peas.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Panko-Crusted Cod, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. imagePrompt.enhanced: An intimate close-up of golden Panko-Crusted Cod, its crispy breading and visible lemon zest glistening. Plated atop a swirl of silky garlic mashed potatoes, vibrant green peas scattered artfully. Soft, diffused natural light illuminates gentle steam rising. Garnish with fresh parsley and a lemon wedge. Eye-level perspective, shallow depth of field, evoking comforting homemade perfection on an American-inspired table.
